Package com.flipkart.business

Class FlipFitGymOwnerService

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.business.FlipFitGymOwnerService
All Implemented Interfaces:
FlipFitGymOwnerInterface
public class FlipFitGymOwnerService extends Object implements FlipFitGymOwnerInterface
Provides business logic for gym owner operations including managing gym profiles, gyms, slots, and bookings.

    • createProfile

      public void createProfile(String username, String password, String name, String address, String phoneNumber, String gstNumber, String panCardNumber) throws ExistingUserException
      Creates a new gym owner profile.
      Specified by:
      createProfile in interface FlipFitGymOwnerInterface
      Parameters:
      username - The username for the gym owner.
      password - The password for the gym owner.
      name - The name of the gym owner.
      address - The address of the gym owner.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the gym owner.
      gstNumber - The GST number of the gym owner.
      panCardNumber - The PAN card number of the gym owner.
      Throws:
      ExistingUserException - If a user with the same username already exists.

      Specified by:

      public void addSlot(String centreId, LocalTime startTime, Integer noOfSeats) throws GymSlotAlreadyExistsException, InvalidGymException

      Specified by:
      addSlot in interface FlipFitGymOwnerInterface
      Parameters:
      centreId - The ID of the gym.
      startTime - The start time of the slot.
      noOfSeats - The number of seats available in the slot.
      Throws:
      GymSlotAlreadyExistsException - If a slot with the same start time already exists for the gym.
      InvalidGymException - If the gym ID is invalid.

    • modifyGym

      public boolean modifyGym(String ownerId, String gymId, String city, String gymName, String gymAddress) throws UnauthorizedGymOwnerException, InvalidGymException
      Modifies the details of an existing gym.
      Specified by:
      modifyGym in interface FlipFitGymOwnerInterface
      Parameters:
      ownerId - The ID of the gym owner.
      gymId - The ID of the gym to be modified.
      city - The new city of the gym.
      gymName - The new name of the gym.
      gymAddress - The new address of the gym.
      Returns:
      true if the modification was successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      UnauthorizedGymOwnerException - If the gym owner is not authorized to modify the gym.
      InvalidGymException - If the gym ID is invalid.
